website_summaries.verdict: Easy to install and use, although some buyers were disappointed that this option didn't come with a Chime mode.
pros: Comes 4 100 decibel alarms to a pack
Simple on-off switch makes them easy to use
cons: Only has Off and Alarm settings – no Chime mode
Adhesive on tape can fail easily
Some buyers said this option arrived faulty or with bad batteries

customer_reviews.title: An Inexpensive Way To Deter Would-Be Break-Ins
customer_reviews.text: I've had these type of alarms in the past, and they certainly service their purpose. They are loud and that's exactly what I want for a determent to a would be break-in. BUT, PLEASE NOTE: If your window/doors are not completely flushed with the frames, these may not be for you. Where I currently live, the windows/doors are old and don't flush correctly with their frames ... I have gaps. But, I made them work for me just the same. This is NO fault of the alarms, makers or seller.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Gives me extra feeling of security
customer_reviews.text: The sticky tape stuck very well before even pressing down hard, which made installation quick and easy and gave me reassurance it won't be falling down anytime soon. The alarm is extremely loud so I know I will be able to hear it going off from upstairs. We already have an alarm system and cameras but not every window has a motion sensor by it so this gives me that extra feeling of security that my house is as secure as Fort Knox. I won't have to worry about any sounds in the middle of the night, unless its the alarm sounding.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: One came defective. They are loud but my husband couldn't hear them in the basement. These are good for at night when your sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Shamblin

customer_reviews.title: Alarming
customer_reviews.text: Good alarm for doors or windows to give a person that extra time that is often need in different circumstances. Very loud and a fair price. Easy to Install
customer_reviews.author: Shotgundan

customer_reviews.title: Loud Enough to Startle Would-be Thieves
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'll admit that I watched tutorial videos on how to mount the units so ensure I mounted correctly and had contact between halves of each unit. A piece of cake to mount once you have tested the connections between halves. Mounted these on all interior windows. LOUD decibel alarm is more than adequate to alert a homeowner of an invasion and neighbors can hear the siren as well. Yes, you can shut off the alarm if you wish to open your windows. But don't forget to turn them back on when the window is shut. Keep spare batteries on hand for future replacement as needed.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveShopperGal

customer_reviews.title: great product for monitoring windows and doors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for monitoring my father who suffers from dementia and walks out of the house unnoticed at times
customer_reviews.author: Tiddkidd

customer_reviews.title: those are a great add on to the system
customer_reviews.text: The neighbors think we installed a very expensive alarm company - truth is we used these untill we installed the expensive alarm company - now w leave them installed - these are instant on, and the ADT is a delayed alarm... I feel it deters people more than ADT alone... Don;t forget to get those video camera light bulbs... those are a great add on to the system.
customer_reviews.author: Bahr Ind

customer_reviews.title: Installed in seconds, loud, VERY affordable, and just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make sure I knew when the kids went outside, as we recently installed a pool. I put all 4 up in under a minute. Our home is almost 150 years old and I was worried the moulding of our doors would prevent us from being able to use these. The magnets need to be close, but don't have to be touching to work. They are very loud, I can even hear the ones in my back sunroom all the way on the second floor. The price is incredible, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loud enough to hear
customer_reviews.text: so far so good hopefully never have to hear this go off
customer_reviews.author: R. kasperek

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend these for anyone needing a simple door alarm
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered as promised. One small issue was handled promptly and they went above and beyond to correct. Would definitely recommend these for anyone needing a simple door alarm. We purchased for a "wandering" relative - it has been an inexpensive and effective deterrent. Thank you LingsFire!
customer_reviews.author: W&M'sG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use. Wish there was door chime option.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. Very loud. Motion detection sensor. Only stops when the door returns to position or turned off manually. I wish there was another option for door chime, which will make it more useful. But I think this product is good enough for its purpose. It's only intended for doors/windows that you will never/rarely open. Otherwise you will need to turn on/off or close the door/window every time as fast as you can. I use in combination with a door chime which is always on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Custom install
customer_reviews.text: Using these for mini-alarms on the toolbox and back hatch for my contractor truck cap. Might not work through cold weather, but I'm going to try them.
customer_reviews.author: T Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Little and loud!
customer_reviews.text: These things are loud! I bought them to put on my screen doors leading to/from the pool. I love the fact that I can turn them off if I am outside and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Daintilus

customer_reviews.title: I bought two packs of these and out of 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packs of these and out of 8 of them 2 worked the rest had either batteries that were faulty ir just didn't even turn on. I'm not going to say anything other than do not purchase this
customer_reviews.author: missmmmp

customer_reviews.title: works great but down't plan on removing it.
customer_reviews.text: The tape is pretty permanent. We rented and it tore off the paint. In our new home i used a removable double sided tape that worked great
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very important part of having peace of mind in my own home.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Keep the 2 year old in!
customer_reviews.text: They were super easy to install and work great to keep my two year old from sneaking out of the house. Doorknob covers don't work for us as our doorknobs are oblong, so this was a perfect fix!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ruskell

customer_reviews.title: Not LADBS pool code compliant
customer_reviews.text: I installed 6 of these. Then failed inspection for pool access. And bought 6 of these Techko S187D Safe Pool Alarm  B0046786U4/ ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apa_Wvm5BbEVGBWGQ
customer_reviews.author: R. Catania

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Only install in one direction. Some windows/openings needed a right/left choice. Only work with surfaces that are flush to each other. Not pool code in the City of Orlando for safety purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Have had for one month. Very loud but what I wanted. Not single beeps but constant noise until door or window is shut. I got it for the doors going to our pool and the kids windows and it makes me feel more at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Seamtress

customer_reviews.title: One of them fell off a couple of days after ...
customer_reviews.text: One of them fell off a couple of days after installation but I pressed it against the window hard again and it has not fallen down. So i give it 5 stars because it may have been my fault i didnt install it right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: luis a mojica

customer_reviews.title: May Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 out of 4 worked. It's supposed to be in the on setting and alarm if window or door opens but it continuously goes off even if nothing is opened. Product could not have been tested. Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: an inexpensive home alarm!
customer_reviews.text: These alarms are easy to install and are VERY loud when set to the "On" position and the door opens!
customer_reviews.author: Coach B...10

customer_reviews.title: Small, really loud and great price.
customer_reviews.text: These little alarms are LOUD. They are small and unobtrusive and a great value. I use them to alarm doors. I cannot evaluate battery life as they have not been installed for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very loud..
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with it ,I would highly recommend. It very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Small Device...
customer_reviews.text: Very small items, and will fit fine. Haven't tried as they will be flying international.
customer_reviews.author: range

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Handy if you don't want to install a complete burglar system. Makes a chime or loud noise when activated.
customer_reviews.author: midnight

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Great product works great for the money good buy. Very loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things work like a charm.. Beeps very loud and will alert you if anyone is breaking in..
customer_reviews.author: To Blessed 2 Be Stressed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE REALLY LOUD. I LIVE ALONE SO THESE MAKE ME FEEL MORE SECURE.
customer_reviews.author: nancy schryver

customer_reviews.title: False alarm is on when it is in turn on position other than that all great. It is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: one out of 4 is not working. False alarm is on when it is in turn on position other than that all great. It is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All doors leading to a swimming pool must have these to pass building code inspections
customer_reviews.author: Beach Guy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It only has two settings, off and on. My old ones had three settings, off,on, and chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Myles

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but there is no middle setting for ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well, but there is no middle setting for simply a short warning sound that a door has been opened.
customer_reviews.author: AMarks

customer_reviews.title: but the double sided tape is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: It is loud and works well, but the double sided tape is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Chagrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect!!!!!! The sounds its enough loud to keep outside bad people!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Leguen

customer_reviews.title: Alam only works when door is open.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Simple to install works well. Would have rated it higher, however it only sounds while the door or window are open. IF one opens a door comes in quickly and shuts the door the alarm shuts off. Some alarms once triggered need to be manually shut off.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Saved my son
customer_reviews.text: Finally safety! I bought these to alert me of my special needs child trying to flee and opening the door to strangers.. He forgot these were on and opened the door to a stranger and immediately slammed it after the alarm sounded. Thank you for providing an affordable item that gives me protection and sanity!
customer_reviews.author: mstenze

customer_reviews.title: These are exactly what our family needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what we needed for our family! Our eldest daughter sleepwalks. These definitely give me peace of mind knowing that all our doors and windows are secure. The alarm is loud and clear without being obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this by mistake. I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this by mistake. I was looking for a similar alarm. One that would Notify my if kids were going out towards the pool. This is a really(really) loud alarm that stays on when activated
customer_reviews.author: Shopkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed them yet but they should be OK for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roy C Compton

customer_reviews.title: Know how loud your megahertz are!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my three-year-old male cat can open my front door without my knowledge. I wanted this to be an alarm to alert me that he had open the door. I did not realize how loud this was. It felt like the sound came from the center of my four head. So, it did not solve my problem. But I can see it working on a window that's not opened a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ADEM T. THYNE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: working well very loud tho lol got hare next day
customer_reviews.author: fowzia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with these at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with these at all. They didn't stick well to doors/windows and I had a couple of areas that were odd angles, but the alarms still fit. Apparently if the alarm and sensor are not RIGHT NEXT TO EACH OTHER (side by side) they don't work. I didn't have them far apart, but just at an odd angle. Waste of time/money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: If you are needing a simple alarm these are a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Charolette E. Purviance
